title: arabic / latin / hebrew question
content:
Can anyone on typophile suggest a suite of fonts to fit a brief in which arabic, english and hebrew versions of a title need to be in successive frames. They can all be compatible in terms of weight and stroke contrst, or the arabic and hebrew can be conflicting / contrasting with the latin script font stylistically transitioning between the two?
